title: The Soldier and His Servant
description: Raheed is bhanak, a "slave soldier" who was bought, educated, and trained by the Mulli empire. When stationed in a rural town, he befriends a deaf beggar boy, Asan. A fierce yet complicated bond grows between them, though neither sees it the same way as the other. Soon, it is not just their loyalties to a nation that is tested, but also their loyalty to each other.
author: Wanda Walker
